title: Epidor
description:
This is when a relaxing, meeting and family place came into life, carrying the standard, which gave the house its reputation.

Today, epidor became the most popular breakfast and lunch destination in Dar es Salaam with its coffee shop featuring a French bakery, Lebanese specialties alongside freshly made juices and specialty coffee
